sense.name: human beings 人类
sense.examples:
我们都是人。
We are all human beings.
人人都渴望成功,这是人之常情。
It's human that everyone is eager for success.

sense.name: person 人
sense.examples:
我们需要有个人帮助我们。
We need a person to help us.
我买了一部六人汽车。
I bought a six-person car.

sense.name: 人, man, character, personality,
sense.examples:
他人很好
He's a nice man.
为人公正
upright in character.

sense.name: 人，别人，people, other people,
sense.examples:
待人诚恳
treat people sincerely.
助人为乐
take pleasure in helping people.

sense.name: 人，人手， 人才，manpower, hand,
sense.examples:
我们这里缺人。
We are shorthanded at the moment.
他需要人帮忙
He needs a hand.

sense.name: body，人的身体，意识，
sense.examples:
他人在心不在。
His body is here but not his heart.
这几天我人不舒服。
I haven't been feeling well for several days. (lit. 'my body doesn't feel well)
